actions.committee: Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate regarding the "Once-a-Day" program to promote local farm products.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate encouraging: (1) Americans to buy local farm products; and (2) sellers to promote such products as "Once-a Day" to support the local economy and the Nation's health.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate regarding the "Once-a-Day" program to promote local farm products.
